title: Brand Beer display fonts
content:
Hi! Please help me id-ing these fonts used in packaging for Brand beer.  
Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212im_/http:/typophile.com/files/15317-brand-zwaar-blond_4641.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [brand-zwaar-blond-jacques-bertens.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212/http:/typophile.com/files/brand-zwaar-blond-jacques-bertens.jpg) | 56.32 KB |
author: Perron 9

comments.content: I'm especially looking for the 'zwaar blond' font.

I didn't spot this exact font -- it may be custom lettering -- but here are a couple of fonts with the same thick & thin inline effect  
Narcissus Open is a heavy typeface designed by Walter Tiemann in 1921 for the Klingspor Foundry in Germany based on ornamental inline capitals first cut Simon Pierre Fournier about 1745. [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/narcissus-sg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/narcissus-sg/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/narcissus-sg/") and [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/narcissus/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/narcissus/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/narcissus/")  
Also Dominus [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/dominus-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/dominus-rr/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/dominus-rr/")  
Don

Thanks Don.  
I just found Titulo [http://www.dafont.com/search.php?q=titulo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=titulo "http://www.dafont.com/search.php?q=titulo")

Good find Rene, a slab serif with an effect somewhere in the ball park. Here's another similar to Dominus & Narcissus; Monumenta [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-monumenta-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140925113212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-monumenta-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-monumenta-pro/")  
Don
